channel.title: GFX teleport help :(
channel.description:
i Want to Change the Home Teleport Gfx anyone know how to!!!!!
Other stuff is I want to Know how to Code in (Every 24 Hours you get a mbox) like karamscape
and change color of name http://prntscr.com/2h87qw

item.title: GFX teleport help :(
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Please be more specific, if we don’t know what base, or which revision for that matter we don’t have a clue on how to help you. I can’t tell you which file to look in for these problems mate. But to be honest I’m gonna make the assumption that you’re using project insanity, so the home teleport gfx should be handled in ClickingButtons.java, in your packets folder. The best way to know which teleport is which is that it could possibly be commented to the side (// home teleport) or you could just search for the coordinates. Anyways, find the case and there should be a GFX in it, change the number to the gfx you would prefer. I know this is a long read and it probably makes hardly any sense, but it’s 2:46am lol.

On to your name/color problem: that’s gonna be client sided no doubt. In client.java search for something along the lines of (guessing, considering I quit developing a while back) “playerName”. If everything seems fit, right before the playerName add something like @or2@. Just for an example, that’s the second shade of orange. Just some ideas, I can’t be specific like I said.

Read full topic
